title: Ball gowns and bloody battles in new Pride and Prejudice and Zombies trailer
text:
Ball gowns and bloody battles in new 'Pride and Prejudice and Zombies' trailer 
Cnet Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Pride and Prejudice and Zombies .""Pride and Prejudice and Zombies" -- which is based on the 2009 Quirk Books horror parody of the Austen novel "Pride and Prejudice" -- shows the...
